options.name: target
options.description: specifies the target of the http request.

options.name: method
options.description: the http method to use. GET/POST/PUT/DELETE

options.name: body
options.description: the body of a POST/PUT request.

options.name: responseSelector
options.description: a selector query of which to replace the innerHTML with the response of the request. Uses document.querySelectorAll internally.
